name: The Thieves!
description:
The time has come to see how hard you worked at the gym!

The Thieves game! challenges you to simulate a robbery in the true sense of the word. Your mission is to collect as much furniture and money as possible from the predestined place.

It seems that someone else knows about this opportunity and you might have competitors. Because time is limited, try to take the most valuable and take it to the car to get the highest income. Hurry, the police are on their way!

Game Features :
- Profitable truck that increases your income x2
- Traps for your competitors
- 60 seconds per attempt
- Multiple levels
